name: Dr. Morgan's Counseling Session
description:
a short visual novel where you meet your new counselor who's totally normal and well adjusted.

features: 
  • gender neutral protagonist w/ a customizable name
  • four endings, 3,275 words total
  • counseling
warning: 
  • stalking
  • kidnapping
  • blood & bruises
  • implied yandere
  • murder via suffocation

i made this to try and learn how flags and such work with renpy, written at 3 AM. apologies if there are any typos or confusing elements. maybe one day i'll expand on this character and his story if i find the motivation..
